tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very much satisfied with your treatment.  I was suffering from gum ache for last week and took various medicines but of no use.  I got very much relief from pain after taking medicine prescribed by you. I am very much thankful to you Doctor. God bless you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hey Doc,
Just wanted To express my gratitude from the very depth of my heart...  I am actually thanking you for all your treatment also for all your efforts in treating me.
Also honestly speaking you are probably only one dentist specialist on whom I can blindly trust. Thankfulness to you doctor for your patience & your team for taking my  case into your  consideration.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was Dr. Ruchi who did the composite filling for my teeth which had chipped. I found the costs a little bit on the higher side than the previous dentist by almost 60% but I must say Dr. Ruchi has the patience of a saint and an absolutely soft hand. Her work is done very well. Thank you Dr. Ruchi. Neat and clean place with absolutely polite staff. Trupti Patel
reply_text:
Thanks a lot . 
Highly appreciate the positive feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazingly friendly and helpful. Knows his job and does it well. Insists for having a cup of coffee as you step in. Good decor, hygienic conditions and very comfortable as you wait for your turn. Well managed and well mannered staff. Maintains post Covid-19 hygiene issues. Will definitely recommend. 10 on 10.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: What I have experienced everytime i have been to Spaceline ...Is that Dr Arpit and Dr Ruchi have used and upgraded their dental clinic with the best technology at par with global trends to treat the tooth issues in the most painless way possible.. it comes with a cost but I think what you get in return is worth it..
reply_text: Thanks aditi for an amazing review

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Straightening,Cosmetic Filling,Implant Rehabilitation,Dental Cleaning,Dental Fillings,
review:
Doctor recognised immediately my dental issues and addressed my treatment with photos, Xrays and full explanation of how best to achieve longterm results. A plan for my procedure is in the planning stage after consulting with me first, which has reassured me of any concerns I had.
I feel excited to know I am in good hands and confident that my doctor will achieve the planned goals ahead.
reply_text: Thanks a lot . These words mean a lot to us and hope we live upto it . We will try our best to achieve what you expect .

review: I opted for laser for teeth problem. They use manual objects  but I prompted for laser treatment for missing tooth. I wanted tooth restored. tags: Value for money,
review: I have issues with my tooth..  had to go for root canal..  the doctor explained everything very nicely.  but the price he quoted**  *** **** ******* ** *** *** ******  ** *** ******* ******* ********* I understand we live in Ghatkopar.. and you need to match the locality.. but still the pricing has to be thought  ******* ******* *** * *******  **
reply_text: Its root canal plus building the tooth and a metal free digital crown .using a digital scanner . And it's a standard price in mumbai not in ghatkopar . Infact much  more in few areas
